titleStmt.title: Psalterium Carolinum the devotions of His Sacred Majesty Charles the First in his solitudes and sufferings / rendred in verse by T.S., Esq. ; and set to musick for three voices, an organ or theorbo, by John Wilson, Dr. in musick, professor in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Stanley, Thomas, 1625-1678.
Faithorne, William, 1616-1691.
Wilson, John, 1595-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Martin, James Allestry, and Thomas Dicas ...,

notesStmt.note: Verse adaptation of the Eikōn basilikē.
Includes frontispiece portrait of Charles I by William Faithorne the elder.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
